Creator: Alma C. Wilson
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Dell Rapids, S.D. 3-16-1948

Hegre Spare Bank

Hegre, norge

Ærede Herrer.  Jeg skulde like at høre fra dere om min mand John Holm nu har nogen penger der i deres bank, samt hvor meget i Amerikanske doller eler regning

Svar strax er di snil luft brev.

Mrs. John Holm

108 West 5 St

Dell Rapids

S.D.

Dell Rapids, S.D. 3-16-1948

Hegre Spare Bank (Savings Bank)

Hegre, norge

Honorable Gentlemen.  I would like to know from you if my husband John Holm presently has any money there in your bank, as well as how much in American dollars or calculations

Reply immediately please  air mail

Mrs. John Holm

108 West 5 St.

Dell Rapids

S.D.
Title: Alma C. Wilson to Hegre Sparebank 1948.3.16
Description:
BLÅPAPIR-KOPI AV ET BREV SKREVET AV ALMA WILSON, PÅ VEGNE AV SIN MOR, DATERT 16. MARS – 1948, TIL HEGRA SPAREBANK.

CARBON COPY OF A LETTER WRITTEN BY ALMA WILSON, ON BEHALF OF HER MOTHER, DATED MARCH 16 – 1948, TO HEGRE SPARE BANK.
